.property instance string Issuer
Public ReadOnly Property Issuer As String
public: property System::String ^ Issuer { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Issuer : string

summary.span: 取得宣告的簽發者。

span.span: Gets the issuer of the claim.

value.span: 參考宣告簽發者的名稱。

span.span: A name that refers to the issuer of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值屬性是取自簽發者名稱登錄所維護的已知的簽發者清單的名稱。The value of the property is a name that is taken from a list of well-known issuers maintained by the issuer name registry. 簽發者名稱登錄是衍生自類別的執行個體類別。The issuer name registry is an instance of a class that derives from the class. 簽發者名稱登錄的名稱相關聯助憶鍵 （簽發者名稱），才能驗證簽發者，所產生之權杖的簽章的密碼編譯資料例如，X.509 憑證。The issuer name registry associates a mnemonic name (the issuer name) with the cryptographic material that is needed to verify signatures of tokens produced by the issuer; for example, an X.509 certificate.

MemberSignature.Value: public string OriginalIssuer { get; }
.property instance string OriginalIssuer
Public ReadOnly Property OriginalIssuer As String
public: property System::String ^ OriginalIssuer { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.OriginalIssuer : string

summary.span: 取得宣告的原始簽發者。

span.span: Gets the original issuer of the claim.

value.span: 參考原始宣告簽發者的名稱。

span.span: A name that refers to the original issuer of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 包含最初發出宣告之實體的名稱。Contains the name of the entity that originally issued the claim. 這個屬性被設計為 dbtype_iunknown，宣告可能通過多個簽發者之前所要的 RP 應用程式的用戶端同盟案例。This property is designed to facilitate scenarios where a claim may pass through multiple issuers before it is presented by the client to the RP application; such as federation scenarios. 值屬性是取自簽發者名稱登錄所維護的已知的簽發者清單的名稱。The value of the property is a name that is taken from a list of well-known issuers maintained by the issuer name registry. 簽發者名稱登錄是衍生自類別的執行個體類別。The issuer name registry is an instance of a class that derives from the class. 簽發者名稱登錄的名稱相關聯助憶鍵 （簽發者名稱），才能驗證簽發者，所產生之權杖的簽章的密碼編譯資料例如，X.509 憑證。The issuer name registry associates a mnemonic name (the issuer name) with the cryptographic material that is needed to verify signatures of tokens produced by the issuer; for example, an X.509 certificate. 委派和同盟的情況下，除了屬性和屬性通常會有相同的值。Except for delegation and federation scenarios, the property and the property will usually have the same value. 如果值屬性的值與不同屬性宣告首次發出的原始簽發者和後續重新簽發者所發出。If the value of the property differs from the value of the property, the claim was first issued by the original issuer and was subsequently re-issued by the issuer.

summary.span: 取得字典，其包含與此宣告相關聯的其他屬性。

span.span: Gets a dictionary that contains additional properties associated with this claim.

value.span: 包含與宣告相關聯之其他屬性的字典。

span.span: A dictionary that contains additional properties associated with the claim.

value.span: 屬性會表示為名稱 / 值組。

span.span: The properties are represented as name-value pairs.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供名稱 / 值組的字典，可讓中繼資料或要與它相關聯的宣告的其他資訊。The property provides a dictionary of name-value pairs that allows metadata or other information about the claim to be associated with it. 產生的 SAML 權杖的宣告，這個字典可包含常數中指定的索引鍵類別。For claims generated from SAML tokens, this dictionary may contain keys given by the constants in the class.

Public ReadOnly Property Subject As ClaimsIdentity

member this.Subject : System.Security.Claims.ClaimsIdentity

summary.span: 取得宣告的主體。

span.span: Gets the subject of the claim.
The subject of the claim.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 主體是哪些已判斷提示宣告的實體。The subject is the entity about which the claim is asserted. 一些典型的範例包括使用者、 應用程式或服務、 裝置或電腦。Some typical examples are a user, an application or service, a device, or a computer. 主體由，其中包含說明其本身的宣告的集合。The subject is represented by a , which contains a collection of claims that describe it.

span.span: The string representation of this object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 傳回字串中包含的值和屬性，以下列格式:。 」類型：值 」。The string that is returned contains the values of the and properties in the following format:."Type: Value".

MemberSignature.Value: public string Type { get; }
.property instance string Type
Public ReadOnly Property Type As String
public: property System::String ^ Type { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Type : string

summary.span: 取得宣告的宣告類型。

span.span: Gets the claim type of the claim.
The claim type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性提供語意宣告的內容，也就是指出宣告是關於。The property provides the semantic content of the claim, that is, it states what the claim is about. 例如，宣告類型的宣告(「http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname") 代表使用者的名字。For example, a claim with a claim type of ("http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/ws/2005/05/identity/claims/givenname") represents a user's first name. 宣告類型通常是 URI;不過，您並不限於任何特定的格式以外，它必須是可表示為字串。The claim type is typically a URI; however, you are not limited to any specific format other than that it must be representable as a string. 只有一般的需求是宣告簽發者和宣告取用者必須同意有關宣告的意義。The only general requirement is that the claim issuer and the claim consumer must agree about the meaning of the claim. 常數，用來使用 Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) 的已知宣告型別都是透過類別。Constants for the well-known claim types used by Windows Identity Foundation (WIF) are available through the class. 宣告值由提供屬性。The claim value is provided by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: public string Value { get; }
.property instance string Value
Public ReadOnly Property Value As String
public: property System::String ^ Value { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.Value : string

summary.span: 取得宣告的值。

span.span: Gets the value of the claim.
The claim value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 宣告的值是僅以字串表示。The value of a claim is represented only as a string. 對於更複雜的數值類型，建議您使用標準的 XML 結構描述型別，表示如何序列化和還原序列化與字串是值。For more complex value types, it is recommended that you use standard XML schema types to indicate how the value is meant to be serialized and deserialized to and from a string. 屬性提供值的相關的基礎語法的型別資訊。The property provides the underlying syntactic type information about the value. 屬性提供值的語意資訊; 也就是它提供值的意義，並指出如何解譯它的宣告取用者。The property provides the semantic information about the value; that is, it provides the meaning of the value and tells a claim consumer how to interpret it.

MemberSignature.Value: public string ValueType { get; }
.property instance string ValueType
Public ReadOnly Property ValueType As String
public: property System::String ^ ValueType { System::String ^ get(); };
member this.ValueType : string

summary.span: 取得宣告的值型別。

span.span: Gets the value type of the claim.
The claim value type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性包含識別值的型別資訊的字串。The property contains a string that identifies the type information of the value. 這個屬性可用來了解值的格式，並提供如何序列化和還原序列化值的相關資訊。This property can be used to understand the format of the value and to provide information about how to serialize and deserialize the value. 如果您的解決方案需要複雜的實值型別，建議您使用中的標準 XML 結構描述型別屬性，指出如何屬性用來序列化和還原序列化字串。If your solution requires complex value types, it is recommended that you use standard XML schema types in the property to indicate how the property is meant to be serialized and deserialized from a string.
